page.title: 16AMY'S FAMILY WEEKEND-SAT.
page.content: As no one works at the weekend we all stay longer in bed and I got up at 10.00am.I got washed,dressed and had breakfast. Then I played with my Sindy dolls and the cat. As it was nice I went out into the garden and played tennis with my brother John. After our dinner of sandwiches and cake I played catch with my dad and John. Then he played on his motor bike so I played dressing up. We were having a barbacue for tea so I helped mum to do the steak,spare ribs and kebabs. After tea we all went to Little Almscliffe,to have a walk , then came back for bedtime. Dad read story and then I went to sleep.
